verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: held] [ARG1: a swanky dinner] and hosted French President Emmanuel Macron [ARGM-LOC: amid a crowd composed of top officials and business leaders] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] held a swanky dinner and [V: hosted] [ARG1: French President Emmanuel Macron] [ARGM-LOC: amid a crowd composed of top officials and business leaders] .
President Donald Trump held a swanky dinner and hosted French President Emmanuel Macron amid [ARG1: a crowd] [V: composed] [ARG2: of top officials and business leaders] .
